Sentencas: Patterned Ni electrodes on single-crystal YSZ are applied as the fuel electrode for solid oxide cells (SOC) to investigate the electrochemical performance in CO/CO2 atmospheres in this paper.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: Patterned Ni maintains stable and intact during the whole test at high temperature (600 degrees C-700 degrees C).
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: The polarization curves and EIS are measured with different operating voltages, temperatures, partial pressure of CO and CO2.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: The experimental results indicate that the patterned Ni electrode in SOEC mode performed a positive correlation with temperature, partial pressure of CO and CO2.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: The influence of partial pressure of CO2 is very weak, mainly due to the limited adsorption sites of CO2 on patterned Ni electrode.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: Besides, the rate of electrochemical reduction of CO2 is obviously slower than that of electrochemical oxidation of CO at the same temperature and gas component.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: Surface diffusion has a much greater effect on SOEC than on SOFC, especially when polarization voltage is small.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: Finally, a simplified reaction mechanism of CO2 electrolysis is proposed.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: The rate determining step of CO2 reduction on patterned Ni electrode could be the charge transfer reaction O(Ni) +
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes

Sentencas: When the polarization voltage of electrolysis is small, the surface diffusion of O(Ni) also' could become rate co-determining.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide/carbon dioxide electrochemical conversion on patterned nickel electrodes operating in fuel cell and electrolysis cell modes
